summary: Christian is the current CEO of Attack! I am passionate about the work we do at Attack!  We provide field marketing and retail marketing solution to Natural Foods brands, Experiential Agencies, and Corporate Events Teams.  I love working with clients to deliver programs that increase sales lift and velocity through metrics-driven analysis.  Clients want results, we bring the experience to the cash register through in-store and geo-targeted events.  Over 15 years, I have worked to promote some of the best brands in the country, driving velocity, with a keen look at CPA, LTV, Lift and brand equity.  A small list of clients I have worked with include:  AMC Networks, Universal Music, Nike, Adidas, Merrell, Jamba Juice, Nestle, Purina, Kevita, ClifBar, Target, Monster, Cadillac, Mini Cooper, Simon Malls, Munchery, HelloFresh, Uber, Warner Records, and more.  Skills:  Marketing - Online, Offline, Field Marketing, ExperientialSales - CRM, Salesforce, Sugar, MarketoMedia Planning - Traditional & Non-TraditionalSocial Media - PlanningAttributes:•	Strong multi-discipline leader accomplished in building and leading mgmt teams.•	Stellar sales & business development professional - driving massive growth through strategy.•	Thought-leader in experiential and presence marketing, retail and social media integration. Strategy:•	Developing business and mktg strategies to grow new product offerings into existing business.•	Demonstrates vision and analytical ability by creating results-driven mid- and long-term plans. •	Led new business initiatives and launched new products.Financial Management: •	Expertise in driving P&L to deliver on revenue and profit goals for operating budgets.•	Applied financial systems and technology to more effectively optimize resources.Specialties: Sales/Business Development, Presence & Experiential Marketing, Financial Controls, Launch Strategy, Positioning, Field Marketing, Social Media, Operations, Market Strategy
